title: Day 1308
content:
# Day 1308

![[https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1980380373231255653](https://x.com/ConorChepenik/status/1980380373231255653)](https://miro.medium.com/1*ioJJr-cFWD47_cWcuS_J5g.png)

This picture sums up nicely what is wrong with modern politics. No one wins votes telling the truth about our fiat monetary system being a ponzi. Though, I do respect the hell out of those who do (Ron Paul being a famous example).

Instead they feed the public a bunch of lies that are not true but sound really good. It's a dirty game, but hopefully the beautiful image above helps you not get fooled by those who seek power.

No politician is coming to save you, so save yourself. Doing so is freeing :)

10/20/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
